alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Northwest Beaverhead County; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 4:20PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Beaverhead County through 515 PM MDT... At 419 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles east of North Fork to 14 miles southeast of Gilmore. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, with isolated lightning strikes. Periods of brief heavy rain are also possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lima, Jackson, Dell, Grant, Bannack Pass, Polaris, Bannack, Clark Canyon, Bannack State Park and Snowline. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Northwest Beaverhead County; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains
